# Classical Cipher

## Vigenere Cipher

```
$ cat text.txt


$ main enc THISISKEY text.txt -f > text.enc

$ cat text.enc


$ python3 crack.py text.enc
KEY_LENGTH=18 -> THIZISKECTLISMSKEY
KEY_LENGTH=45 -> ALYZMDRBJTUYZMIOCFXWNLTZMUYGXIFPWALCEOVIIUALC
KEY_LENGTH=54 -> QEISMWDGVQHIZMLHBNTLMZBPHEYXLBLLIKEFXAKPYSOICMEFHIWOLR
KEY_LENGTH=27 -> ALISPWKEFTHIZMSLLYTOISIZOER
KEY_LENGTH=51 -> TLYPIPWAFLALQXJCJCZLFKIZTRLPLVKAPLAFJULCJPGVBKIOTRC
KEY_LENGTH=42 -> FIFTUKDBSAFAGMQBIPVOKQLSLFPWIFXIOKBKILLALY
KEY_LENGTH=9 -> THISISKEY
KEY_LENGTH=63 -> QEFPFPOBCMLMLGUKEAVUVFVFKEYTHIPFPHBVQLFWBWOXWVHIUKFXRLGUIIIPKBV
KEY_LENGTH=62 -> LIPPSASVPHXLMWMWEZMKIRIVIGMTLIVLIPPSASVPHXLMWMWEZMKIRIVIGMTLIV
KEY_LENGTH=21 -> QIFLFVQIFMLMGMVXEAGBK
KEY_LENGTH=36 -> XHIZMWKEYXLISVWKEYTHIZILKECMAISMLDEC
KEY_LENGTH=44 -> YZPBLLYLKOAHWUIYMPBLXIZKOPEXYIOEFBLKUAJILIXY
KEY_LENGTH=3 -> TLF
KEY_LENGTH=14 -> IIITVVKKELLALL
KEY_LENGTH=15 -> LIFXFILIVXJFGXV
KEY_LENGTH=22 -> YVPQEUYLVKIELXYYKPLLXY
KEY_LENGTH=6 -> LLFTIF
```
